Hippocampus CA2 basket cell broad.Comment: This cell lacks calbindin.  We need to add a "lacks molecular constituent" property
Hippocampus CA2 basket cell broad.DefiningCitation: Mercer et. al. J. Neurosci 2007 PMID: 17611285
Hippocampus CA2 basket cell broad.Definition: The CA2 basket cells are the largest group of interneurons whose vertically oriented dendrites extend across all layers from stratum oriens into stratum lacunosum-moleculare and whose axons ramify extensively in stratum pyramidale. The broad basket cells have significantly broader dendritic width, and axonal arbors than that of other types of CA2 basket cells or of CA1 basket cells.
